text: Philip Paul (August 11, 1925 â€“ January 30, 2022) was an American studio drummer. He was born in Harlem, New York. In 2009, he was honored at the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum in Cleveland. He spent most of his career in Cincinnati, Ohio. Paul died on January 30, 2022 in Cincinnati from COVID-19 at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American rock drummers Category:Musicians from New York City Category:Musicians from Cincinnati Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Ohio
title: Philip Paul (drummer)
